taskDefinition.name: Kinetic Request CE Submissions Retrieve By Query
taskDefinition.author: support@kineticdata.com
taskDefinition.description: Searchs a form's submissions in Kinetic Request CE for the specified space.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from.

parameter.label: Kapp Slug:
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Kapp the form is for.

parameter.label: Form Slug:
parameter.tooltip: The id of the form being retrieved.

parameter.label: Includes
parameter.tooltip: Options are details, origin, parent, children, descendents, form, type, and values. Include any or all of these, comma separated.

parameter.label: Limit
parameter.tooltip: Number of records to limit the API call, integer between 1 and 1000.

parameter.label: Query:
parameter.tooltip: The query that will be used to search the submissions. Ex: values[company]=Kinetic
